name: Sweethome
story: You are at your sweet home, and you are sitting on the couch thinking of great exciting adventure!
nav: press 1 to go to the seashore, press 2 to go to KFC and press 3 to go to the mountain

name: Seashore
story: You are at the seashore, excellent scenery around and high beach waves touching feet
nav: press 1 to go home sweethome, 2 to go to the KFC, or 3 to go to the waterfall

name: Mountain
story: You are at the mountain, with mesmerizing scenic beauty views all around
nav: Press 1 to go back to home sweethome, press 2 to go to the valley, and press 3 to go to the dazzling stars

name: Valley
story: You are on the valley, admiring the nature
nav: Press 1 to go to the sweethome, Press 2 to go to fountain. Press 3 to go to Lala Land

name: Waterfall
story: You are at the waterfall  and need to have some rest
nav: press 1 to go to the Seashore, press 2 to go sweethome, press 3 to go the pizza hut

name: KFC
story: You are at the KFC waiting for some sizzling hot chicken
nav: Press 1  to go sweethome. Press 2 to go to Jupiter. Press 3 to go to Swimming pool

name: Dominos
story: You are at the Dominos, eating your favourite pizza
nav: Press 1 to go to sweethome 2 to go to Zoo 3 to go to Dazzling stars

name: Burgerking
story: You need energy to go ahead, so grab a burger at the king of burgers
nav: press 1 to go the KFC, 2 to go to the fountain of Dominos, 3 to go to forever island

name: Magicland
story: You are on the magic land, on a war with the witches
nav: Press 1 to go to the LaLa Land, and press 2 to go to sweethome and press 3 to go to Zoo

name: Dazzlingstars
story: Your space ship arrived at the Dazzling stars, you met some other pirates.
nav: Press 1 to go to sweethome 2 to go to valley 3 to go to Jupiter

name: Jupiter
story: You are on Jupiter
nav: Press 1 to go to the Dazzling stars 2 to the Treasure hill 3 to go to Gaming zone

name: Pluto
story: you are on Pluto and having party with friends.
nav: Press 1 to go to waterfall, press 2 to go to valleyand press 3 to go to the heaven

name: Heaven
story: You are at the high heaven, and enjoying the bliss
nav: press 1 to go to the Zoo, press 2 to explore the haven press 3 to go to the Seashore

name: Love
story: Your are with your love and enjoying the peace
nav: press 1 to go to the pluto, press 2 to go sweethome, press 3 to go to the Seashore

name: Forever
story: you are at the forever island and searching for ways to come out of it
nav: press 1 to call Dazzling stars 2 to call Pluto and 3 to go sweethome

name: Palace
story: You are at the Alien palace and leaving no way around to escape
nav: press 1 to go to the Zoo, 2 to go to forever, 3 to the Dominos

name: Fountain
story: you are at the fountain and found an important clue
nav: press 1 to go to Jupiter 2 to Pluto or 3 to the Magicland

name: Lala land
story: You are in LaLa Land and you buy some fancy thinks
nav: Press 1 to go to dazzling stars. Press 2 to go to forvever, Press 3 to go to the gaming zone

name: Swimming pool
story: you are in the swimming pool and relaxing
nav: press 1 to go to go to the Swimming pool, press 2 to go to Dazzling stars and press 3 to go to Gaming zone

name: Gaming zone
story: You are at the Gaming zone, there is a lot of drinks and rum
nav: Press 1 to go to Casino 2 to go to pizza hut, and 3 to go to Burgerking

name: Mysterious hut
story: in your wreckage you struggle to make out of the thick smoke outisde the mysterious hut
nav: press 1 to go to the Zoo, 2 to go to the Swimming pool, 3 to go to the Mountain

name: Treasure hill
story: while enjoying your drink, you eavesdropped and heard where to find the treasure
nav: press 1 to go to the Zombie jungle press 2 to see the Alien area, press 3 to go to Casino

name: Casino
story: Ah an amazing place! You enjoy the vibe!!
nav: Press 1 to go to the KFC, press 2 to go to the Mountain, press 3 to go to the mysterious hut

name: pizza hut
story: you are at pizza hut and enjoying strawberry on it.

name: Zoo
story: your Space ship missed in the Zoo of dangerous Dinosaurs

name: Treasure Island
story: You found the  treasure of the high seas! You win!

name: Alienarea
story: You found the alien land, you win!

name: Underwater whirlpool

name: Zombie jungle
story: You are worried that the Zombies want to eat you! You lose!
